skilllist.skilldesc:
Khufra activates the Spell Curse left by Esmeralda every 12s, enhancing his next Basic Attack. The enhanced Basic Attack gains extra attack range and deals <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> equal to <font color="fba51f"> (+120% Total Physical Attack)</font> plus 6% of the target's Max HP. He also slows the target by 30% for 1.5s and heals 8% of his Max HP on hit.
Each time Khufra applies a control effect to an enemy hero with his skill, the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Spell Curse</font> is reduced by 4s.

Khufra pulls the bandage on his arms to launch himself in the specified direction, dealing <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> equal to 50 plus 7<font color="fba51f"> (+1.5% Extra Physical Attack)</font>% of his Max HP to all enemy units on the path. When blinking to the furthest distance or encountering a first enemy hero, Khufra will immediately stop, dealing <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> equal to 50 plus 7<font color="fba51f"> (+1.5% Extra Physical Attack)</font>% of his Max HP to enemies nearby and then knocking them in the air for up to 1s.

Khufra uses bandage to wrap himself into a magic bouncing ball, increasing his own Physical & Magic Defense by 30%. Enemies trying to use blink skills to move across Khufra will be knocked airborne. 
Each time the magic bouncing ball hits the ground, it will deal <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> equal to 50 plus 3<font color="fba51f"> (+2% Extra Physical Attack)</font>% of his Max HP to enemies nearby and slow them by 80%. Lasts 0.2s.

Khufra pulls back all enemy targets around him toward his front, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and slowing them down for 1.25s. If the enemies are knocked against walls, extra <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> equal to 150% of this skill's damage will be inflicted upon them, and they will be stunned, instead of slowed.

__data.skilldesc: For 3s, gain 35% <font color="62f8fe">Damage Reduction</font> and deal 35% <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> back to the attacker each time you receive damage.
__data.skilldesc_text: For <Num1>s, gain <%Num3> [C2Damage Reduction] and deal <%Num2> [C1Magic Damage] back to the attacker each time you receive damage.

recommendmasterplan.description: Roaming: Tank all damage and return it to the enemy.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+500 Extra Max HP
+10 Extra Physical Defense
+10 Extra Magic Defense
+4 HP Regen

emblemskill.skilldesc: When HP is below 50%, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by 15.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: When HP is below <%Num1>, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by <Num2>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: When HP is below 50%, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by 15.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
After the next Basic Attack, deal 100(+0.07 Total HP) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: After the next Basic Attack, deal <Num1> Magic Damage to nearby enemies.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num2>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
After the next Basic Attack, deal 100(+7% Total HP) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Passive - Encourage:
equiplist.equipskill2: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskill4: <font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
equiplist.equipskill5: <font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
equiplist.equipskill6: <font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Passive - Encourage: 
Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
<font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
<font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
<font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Magic Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+500 Mana
+55 Extra Physical Defense
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Deter: When hit by a skill, reduces the attacker's Physical Damage by 6% for 2s (this effect stacks up to 3 times).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Deter: When hit by a skill, reduces the attacker's Physical Damage by 6% for 2s (this effect stacks up to 3 times).
equiplist.equiptips:
+920 Extra Max HP
+40 Extra Physical Defense
+4 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Bladed Armor: When struck by a Basic Attack, deals Physical Damage equal to 30% of the incoming damage (calculated before Damage Reduction) plus <font color="26e407"> (+0.2 Total Physical Defense)</font> to the attacker and slows them by 15% for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Bladed Armor: When struck by a Basic Attack, deals Physical Damage equal to 30% of the incoming damage (calculated before Damage Reduction) plus <font color="26e407"> (+0.2 Total Physical Defense)</font> to the attacker and slows them by 15% for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+20% Crit Damage Reduction
+70 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1:
Conceal: <font color="ffe63c">Blessing:</font> Continue to gain Gold (limit: 1500) through Roaming Equipment to keep enhancing <font color="a6aafb">Conceal</font>(current: <font color="ffe63c"> (+1 Roaming Gold)</font>)!
Active: Nearby allied heroes enter Camouflage State and their Movement Speed increases by <font color="ffe63c"> (+0.04 Roaming Gold)</font>% for 5s. Dealing or taking damage ends this state.

equiplist.equipskill4: <font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.

equiplist.equipskill6: <font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Conceal: <font color="ffe63c">Blessing:</font> Continue to gain Gold (limit: 1500) through Roaming Equipment to keep enhancing <font color="a6aafb">Conceal</font>(current: <font color="ffe63c"> (+1 Roaming Gold)</font>)!
Active: Nearby allied heroes enter Camouflage State and their Movement Speed increases by <font color="ffe63c"> (+0.04 Roaming Gold)</font>% for 5s. Dealing or taking damage ends this state.
Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
<font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
<font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
<font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Magic Defense

equiplist.equipskill1:
Thunderbolt: Every 4s, the next Basic Attack deals 50<font color="26e407"> (+1 Extra Physical Defense)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+1 Extra Magic Defense)</font> extra True Damage to the target and enemies around them, and briefly slows them by 99%. Hybrid Defense permanently increases by 1 each time the attack hits an enemy hero.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect is reduced to 50% for Marksmen and Mages.</font>
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Thunderbolt: Every 4s, the next Basic Attack deals 50<font color="26e407"> (+1 Extra Physical Defense)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+1 Extra Magic Defense)</font> extra True Damage to the target and enemies around them, and briefly slows them by 99%. Hybrid Defense permanently increases by 1 each time the attack hits an enemy hero.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect is reduced to 50% for Marksmen and Mages.</font>

equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.

equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.

equiplist.equipskilldesc: Holy Blessing: Taking Magic Damage grants 5(+1*Hero Level) Magic Defense for 5s, up to 6 stacks (can only gain 1 stack(s) every 0.6s).

recommendmasterplan.name: BF - Fangor
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

assist.desc: Khufra works best with heroes with strong CC abilities that make it easier for his 1st Skill to hit, such as Eudora and Pharsa.

strong.desc: Khufra's 2nd Skill can be used to interrupt movement abilities, making him strong against heroes who fight with movement abilities, such as Joy and Lancelot.

weak.desc: Khufra is countered by resilient tank heroes, as his CC abilities pose no threat to these heroes. Heroes like Fredrinn and Gloo are good examples here.
